name: CONTACT_INFO_ID_TO_INDIVIDUAL_REF_MAPPING
description: Represents the reference relationship between 'ContactInfoID' and 'IndividualRef'. Each 'ContactInfoID' uniquely identifies a contact and maps to an individual via 'IndividualRef'. This mapping is critical for associating contact details with specific individuals.
prompt: Validate that each <ContactInfoID> in <ContactInfo> maps correctly to an <IndividualRef>, ensuring the reference is unique and consistent.
